headline: Aptiv to Release Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SCHAFFHAUSEN, Switzerland, June 27, 2025--Aptiv PLC (NYSE: APTV) will release its second quarter 2025 financial results on July 31, 2025 and will hold an investor call the same day at 8:00 a.m. ET. The call will be hosted by Aptiv's Chair and Chief Executive Officer, Kevin Clark, and Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Varun Laroyia.
